column5: where can you buy frozen smelt for bait? can't find em at food basics...i live in kitchener
Sobeys has them in the frozen fish section
I've bought them frozen at zehrs, and fresh at caudles catch in Kitchener.
saw them in the no frills and the price chopper here
price choppers has a frozen bag of frozen smelt for about 5 buck for a Kg.  deadly on Lakers in Quebec
